code:
sequenceDiagram participant A as Computadora A
(HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault) participant S as Switch
(HealthTech_EMR_Sync) participant B as Computadora B
(HealthTech_LabAnalyzer) participant C as Computadora C
(HealthTech_LabAnalyzer) participant D as Computadora D
(HealthTech_LabAnalyzer) Note over S: Tabla MAC vacía Note over A,D: FASE 1: ARP Request (HealthTech_EMR_Sync) A->>S: ARP Request
Origen: A (HealthTech_EMR_Sync)
Destino: Broadcast (HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine) Note over S: Aprende: Puerto 1 → MAC de A S->>B: ARP Request (HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine) S->>C: ARP Request (HealthTech_EMR_Sync) S->>D: ARP Request (HealthTech_EMR_Sync) Note over B,D: Solo C responde al ARP Note over A,D: FASE 2: ARP Response C->>S: ARP Response
Origen: C (HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault)
Destino: A (HealthTech_EMR_Sync) Note over S: Aprende: Puerto 3 → MAC de C S->>A: ARP Response (HealthTech_LabAnalyzer) Note over A,D: FASE 3: Comunicación Directa A->>S: Datos para C
Origen: A (HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault)
Destino: C (HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault) Note over S: Consulta tabla MAC
Encuentra C en puerto 3 S->>C: Datos (HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault)
